H0.text: What was the name of David Bowie’s final album released two days before his death. The Next Day

H1.text: What was the name of David Bowie’s final album released two days before his death. Let's Dance

H2.text: What was the name of David Bowie’s final album released two days before his death. Aladdin Sane

H3.text: What was the name of David Bowie’s final album released two days before his death. BLACKSTAR

A4.text: Blackstar was released on 8 January 2016, two days before Bowie's death.

A5.text: Visconti revealed that Bowie had planned the album to be his swan song.
